metadata.title: Blueshift
metadata.description: Learn how to write your own on-chain programs from the top instructors in the Solana ecosystem.
metadata.keywords: Solana, Blueshift, learn, qualification, vault, escrow, AMM, native, pinocchio, quantum, SPL token

deposit.title: 挑戰 1：接收存款
deposit.description: 您的程式應允許使用者將 SOL 存入自己的保險庫。

withdraw.title: 挑戰 2：允許提款
withdraw.description: 保險庫擁有者應能夠從其保險庫中提取 SOL。

make.title: Challenge 1: Making an escrow swap deal
make.description: Your program should allow a user to create a swap order secured by an escrow.

take.title: Challenge 2: Taking an escrow swap deal
take.description: Your program should allow a user to take an escrow swap deal.

refund.title: Challenge 3: Canceling an escrow swap deal
refund.description: Your program should allow a user to cancel an escrow swap deal and refund the maker.

deposit.title: Challenge 1: Taking deposits
deposit.description: Your program should allow a user to deposit SOL into their own vault.

withdraw.title: Challenge 2: Allowing withdrawal
withdraw.description: The vault owner should be able to withdraw SOL from their vault.

lessons.title: 選擇一門課程開始
lessons.subtitle: 歡迎,
lessons.empty_results_description: 嘗試搜尋不同的課程或使用篩選器。
lessons.empty_filters_title: 您沒有選擇任何篩選器
lessons.empty_filters_description: 選擇您想學習的語言以在此處查看結果。

ui.search_placeholder: 按名稱、語言或級別搜尋...

rewards.title: 領取、查看和分享您的 NFT
rewards.subtitle: 獎勵
rewards.empty_description: 嘗試更改您的篩選器以在此處查看獎勵。
rewards.claimed_description: NFT 已在您的錢包中可用

shift_goal.title: 設定您的 Shift 目標
shift_goal.description: 接收每週提醒，讓您按計劃實現目標！

wallet_recommended.title: 連接您的錢包
wallet_recommended.description: 連接您的錢包以推進課程並賺取 NFT 獎勵！

challenges.locked_description: 先完成課程以解鎖挑戰。
challenges.connect_wallet_description: 需要 Solana 錢包才能完成挑戰並解鎖 NFT
challenges.challenge_completed_description: 您已完成挑戰並解鎖 NFT 獎勵！
challenges.challenge_completed_skip_description: 您可以在獎勵頁面上查看您解鎖的獎勵。
